subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Orlando Hernández was spectacular in his first two starts for the Mets, but he never had command of his pitches Saturday and was ejected from the game in the sixth inning for hitting a batter.
snippet: Orlando Hernández was spectacular in his first two starts for the Mets, but he never had command of his pitches Saturday and was ejected from the game in the sixth inning for hitting a batter.
